Hi,

You said that the update is to delete a file. But your "IsApplicable" rule look if the file doesn't exist ?!?!
So the update apply only on computers where the file doesn't exist :-)
I bet that computers report update as installed.

Hi,
you are right! I changed the settings on both rules and it works.
Thank you again.
